mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(productno, productcateno, name, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(productno), 0) + 1 as productno FROM product), #{productcateno}, #{name}, #{content}, #{recom}, #{cnt}, #{replycnt}, sysdate, #{word});
mapper.select: SELECT productno, productcateno, name, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word FROM product ORDER BY productno DESC
SELECT productno, productcateno, name, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word FROM product WHERE productcateno=#{productcateno} ORDER BY productno DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM product
SELECT productno, productcateno, name, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word FROM product WHERE productno=#{productno}

SELECT productno, productcateno, name, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word FROM product
WHERE word LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
ORDER BY productno DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM product
WHERE word LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
